roleset.name: average, to be expected

roles.note: Arg0 from the verb not included

example.name: the arg
example.text: All nations have them and they all tend to be different -LRB- which-1 [*-1] is normal considering different nations have different cultures , traditions and customs -RRB- , it just so happens that in Israel the requirement is that your mother is / was Jewish , it is different to requirments in other countries but it is no less valid .
example.arg: considering different nations have different cultures, traditions and customs -RBR-

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, normalize.01.
